item.title: China Poised to Scale Back EU Summit in Latest Sign of Strain
item.description: The Chinese government intends to cancel part of a two-day summit with European Union leaders planned for later this month in the latest signs of the tensions between Brussels and Beijing.

Wang says he hopes Belgium will provide a fair, safe and predictable business environment for Chinese companies, according to a statement from the the country’s Ministry of Foreign Affairs.
